key_points: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have released the first photo of their daughter, Lilibet 'Lili' Diana Mountbatten-Windsor.
The photo was shared as part of their holiday message, showcasing the family of four.
Lilibet is named after Queen Elizabeth, whose family nickname is Lilibet, and Princess Diana.
Lili is the second child of Prince Harry and Meghan, following their son Archie.
Archie is reported to be very happy about having a little sister.
Lilibet is the fifth grandchild of Prince Charles and the eleventh great-grandchild of Queen Elizabeth.
The family's statement revealed Lili was born at Santa Barbara Cottage Hospital in Santa Barbara, CA, weighing 7 lbs 11 oz.
Prince Harry and Meghan expressed gratitude for the warm wishes and prayers in a statement after Lili's birth.
A personal note expressing gratitude for the love and support from across the globe was posted on their Archewell website.
The couple's inclusion of Lili's birth in their holiday message combines a personal moment with their public communications.
